## alfresco-data-model package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Dictionary](./alfresco-data-model.dictionary.md) | Dictionary implementation that keeps all classes, properties and associations in-memory |
|  [DictionaryCircularDependencyError](./alfresco-data-model.dictionarycirculardependencyerror.md) | This error indicates a circular dependency in the inheritance or mandatory aspect chain |
|  [DictionaryError](./alfresco-data-model.dictionaryerror.md) | Base class for errors thrown by dictionary operations |
|  [DictionaryMissingDependencyError](./alfresco-data-model.dictionarymissingdependencyerror.md) | This error indicates a missing dependency in the inheritance or mandatory aspect chain |
|  [QNameError](./alfresco-data-model.qnameerror.md) | An error thrown when a QName can not be created from a string |
|  [QNameFactory](./alfresco-data-model.qnamefactory.md) | Creates QNames from strings |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AssociationDefinition](./alfresco-data-model.associationdefinition.md) | Describes an association between two nodes<!-- -->An association is a link between two nodes.<!-- -->There are two kinds of associations: parent-child association and source-target association. Both are represented by the same structure, distinguished by the value of [AssociationDefinition.childAssociation](./alfresco-data-model.associationdefinition.childassociation.md)<!-- -->.<!-- -->The source and target of the association reference a class (type or aspect) which that side has to implement. Both sides of an association can be single- or multi-valued and can optionally be mandatory(enforced). |
|  [ClassDefinition](./alfresco-data-model.classdefinition.md) | Describes a class for a node.<!-- -->A class is a type or an aspect that can be applied to a node. |
|  [IDictionary](./alfresco-data-model.idictionary.md) | Metadata Model Dictionary that provides access to metadata models |
|  [IQNameFactory](./alfresco-data-model.iqnamefactory.md) | Factory that creates QName objects from fully-qualified QName strings or prefixed QName strings. |
|  [PropertyDefinition](./alfresco-data-model.propertydefinition.md) | Describes a property of a node.<!-- -->A property is metadata of a certain type that belongs to a node. |
|  [QName](./alfresco-data-model.qname.md) | A QName is the fully qualified name of a type, aspect, property, association, ...<!-- -->A QName consists of a namespace URI, a prefix (that is a shorter alias for the namespace URI) and a local name. |

|  Namespace | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [QName](./alfresco-data-model.qname.md) | Functions that operate on a QName instance |
